Box of Bombs

Explosive Decoy
Item Level 80

"Warning Label: May explode prematurely if subjected to an electromagnetic pulse."

Sell Price: 10

itemData.name: Cobalt Frag Bomb
itemData.htmlTooltip:
Cobalt Frag Bomb
Item Level 71
Requires Engineering (330)
Use: Inflicts 750 to 1000 Fire damage and incapacitates targets for 3 sec in a 3 yard radius.  Any damage will break the effect. (1 Min Cooldown)
Max Stack: 20
Sell Price: 6

itemData.name: Heartseeker Scope
itemData.htmlTooltip:
Heartseeker Scope
Item Level 80
Requires Level 70
Use: Attaches a permanent scope to a bow or gun that increases its ranged critical strike rating by 40.

Attaching this scope to a ranged weapon causes it to become soulbound.
Max Stack: 5
Sell Price: 2 50

itemData.name: Sun Scope
itemData.htmlTooltip:
Sun Scope
Item Level 75
Requires Level 70
Use: Attaches a permanent scope to a bow or gun that increases your ranged haste rating by 40.

Attaching this scope to a ranged weapon causes it to become soulbound.
Max Stack: 5
Sell Price: 5

itemData.name: Diamond-cut Refractor Scope
itemData.htmlTooltip:
Diamond-cut Refractor Scope
Item Level 75
Requires Level 70
Use: Attaches a permanent scope to a bow or gun that increases its damage by 15.

Attaching this scope to a ranged weapon causes it to become soulbound.
Max Stack: 5
Sell Price: 3 50

itemData.name: Nitro Boosts
itemData.htmlTooltip:
Nitro Boosts
Permanently attaches overpowered nitro boosts to a pair of boots, increasing your critical strike rating by 24 and allowing you to greatly increase run speed for 5 sec.

The nitro boosts can only be activated every 3 minutes and require an Engineering skill of at least 400.

itemData.name: Hand-Mounted Pyro Rocket
itemData.htmlTooltip:
Hand-Mounted Pyro Rocket
Permanently attaches a hand-mounted pyro rocket launcher to your gloves, allowing a skilled engineer to deal 1654 to 2020 Fire damage to an enemy at long range. The rocket can only be fired once every 45 sec.

Can only be used on the engineer's gloves, and doing so will cause them to become soulbound.

itemData.name: Hyperspeed Accelerators
itemData.htmlTooltip:
Hyperspeed Accelerators
Permanently attaches hyperspeed accelerators to a pair of gloves, allowing a skilled engineer to increase their haste rating by 340 (10.37% @ L80) for 12 sec. The gloves can only be activated every minute.

itemData.name: Reticulated Armor Webbing
itemData.htmlTooltip:
Reticulated Armor Webbing
Permanently inserts reticulated armor webbing into gloves, increasing armor by 885.

Attaching the armor webbing causes the gloves to become soulbound. An Engineering skill of 400 is required to keep the webbing active.

itemData.name: Personal Electromagnetic Pulse Generator
itemData.htmlTooltip:
Personal Electromagnetic Pulse Generator
Permanently attaches a high-powered device to your belt, allowing you to confuse nearby mechanicals. Only a skilled engineer can activate the modified belt.

Can only be attached to your own belt, and doing so causes the belt to become soulbound.

itemData.name: Frag Belt
itemData.htmlTooltip:
Frag Belt
Attach a miniaturized explosive assembly to your belt, allowing you to detach and throw a Cobalt Frag Bomb every 6 minutes.

itemData.name: Flexweave Underlay
itemData.htmlTooltip:
Flexweave Underlay
Permanently attaches a flexweave underlay to a cloak, increasing Agility by 23 and allowing you to turn the cloak into a parachute to fall slowly for 30 sec.

The cloak can only be used once a minute and requires an Engineering skill of at least 350.

itemData.name: Springy Arachnoweave
itemData.htmlTooltip:
Springy Arachnoweave
Permanently attaches a springy arachnoweave to a cloak, increasing spell power by 27 and allowing you to turn the cloak into a parachute to fall slowly for 30 sec.

The cloak can only be used once a minute and requires an Engineering skill of at least 350.

itemData.name: Mind Amplification Dish
itemData.htmlTooltip:
Mind Amplification Dish
Attaches a tiny mind amplification dish to your helmet, increasing Stamina by 45 and allowing you to engage in mental battle with your enemies to, hopefully, control them. Can be used every 10 min.

Enchanting your helm binds it to you. Requires 350 engineering to use.

itemData.name: Jeeves
itemData.htmlTooltip:
Jeeves
Item Level 200
Binds when picked up
Requires Engineering (450)
Use: Requests the presence of Jeeves, the perfect gentleman robot butler, who will attend to your needs for 10 min.

Jeeves can grant bank access to very skilled engineers and perform mundane tasks such as buying, selling, and repairing for anyone. (1 Hour Cooldown)

itemData.name: Mechano-hog
itemData.htmlTooltip:
Mechano-hog
Item Level 80
Mount
Requires any Horde race
Requires Level 40
Requires Riding (150)
Use: Teaches you how to ride this sweet hog.
Rides and parks a badass Mechano-hog.  This is a very fast set of wheels.
Sell Price: 1 25

itemData.name: Mekgineer's Chopper
itemData.htmlTooltip:
Mekgineer's Chopper
Item Level 80
Mount
Requires any Alliance race
Requires Level 40
Requires Riding (150)
Use: Teaches you how to ride this chopper.
Rides and parks a rockin' Mekgineer's Chopper.  This is a very fast set of wheels.

itemData.name: Turbo-Charged Flying Machine Control
itemData.htmlTooltip:
Turbo-Charged Flying Machine Control
Item Level 70
Mount
Requires Level 70
Requires Engineering (375)
Requires Artisan Riding
Use: Teaches you how to summon this mount. Can only be summoned in Outland or Northrend. This is a very fast ride.
Summons and dismisses a Turbo-Charged Flying Machine.  This is a very fast ride.  This vehicle can only be used in Outland or Northrend.  Requires 375 engineering skill to ride.

itemData.name: MOLL-E
itemData.htmlTooltip:
MOLL-E
Item Level 80
Requires Engineering (425)
Use: Creates a portable mailbox for 10 min.  MOLL-E is not destroyed after use. (2 Hrs Cooldown)
"Mobile Oversized Letter and Literary Extractor"

itemData.htmlTooltip:
Wormhole Generator: Northrend
Item Level 80
Binds when used
Requires Engineering (415)
Use: Creates an unstable wormhole the Engineer can use to travel around Northrend.  Lasts 1 min. (4 Hrs Cooldown)
"Dimensional folding is not fully understood in any capacity.  A parachute and medical supplies are best kept on hand!"
Sell Price: 50
